data.title: CCTV New Year's Gala
data.meta_description:
Upper Intermediate ChinesePod Lesson: The CCTV New Year's Gala, also known as the Spring Festival Gala, and commonly abbreviated in Chinese as Chunwan, is a Chinese New Year special produced by China Central Television.

Listen to a dialogue about a family prepare to watch this event and how it has become a tradition in the household during Chinese New Year.
